creator: ingo-apache@kkeane.com
text:
The summary says it all: configure --help claims that the default for sysconfigdir is PREFIX/etc, when it really is PREFIX/conf.

Because of this flaw, it took me a while to figure out that this was the parameter I needed to tweak to get the httpd.conf file to end up somewhere else but the default location.

Hi Ingo,

it seems that this bug is really old and probably the issue has been fixed during these years. I don't see a lot of traction so I suppose that we could close it, but please re-open it if anything is missing.

Luca
